name: Super Pets
content: Krypto the Super-Dog and Superman are inseparable best friends, sharing the same superpowers and fighting crime side by side in Metropolis. However, Krypto must master his own powers for a rescue mission when Superman is kidnapped.

name: Самуурайн Түүх
content: Hank, a loveable dog with a head full of dreams about becoming a samurai, sets off in search of his destiny.

name: Minoins 2: The Rise of Gru
content: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

name: THOR: Love and Thunder
content: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

name: Bullet Train IMAX
content: Five assassins aboard a fast moving bullet train find out their missions have something in common.

name: Paradise Highway
content: A truck driver has been forced to smuggle illicit cargo to save her brother from a deadly prison gang. With FBI operatives hot on her trail, Sally's conscience is challenged when the final package turns out to be a teenage girl.

name: Саран Хийл
content: Нэр нөлөө бүхий УИХ-ын гишүүний хамгийн ойрын шадар болох алдартай бизнесмений ганц хүү бол дээдсийн хүрээлэнгийн цуутай сайхан залуусын нэг. Гэтэл тэр байдаг л нэг хөгжимчний охинд дурлана. Хүүгийнх нь сонголт эцэгт нь таалагдсангүй. Эцэг нь өөрийнхөө зүтгэдэг УИХ-ын гишүүний нийгэмд шуугиан тариад байгаа секс скандалыг хаацайлахын тулд хүний санаанд багтамгүй башир арга сэдээд байлаа.

name: Room 203
content: Two best friends and roommates are terrified by the vengeful spirits dwelling in their apartment. Based on the novel published by Kobunsha and written by Nanami Kamon.
